name: Rome
author: Foggy
shortdesc: An updated version of the theme Rome.
longdesc: An updated version of the theme Rome originally created by Maxence Parenteau. A subtle circular theme. ***SET CUSTOM CORNER RADIUS TO 0 TO FIX CALENDAR AND CLOCK ICON ISSUES***
